dct_title_s: Oil & gas map of the eastern Mediterranean / designed, produced and distributed by Petroleum Economist in association with Eni. (Advertisement)
dct_description_sm: Relief and depths shown by shading and gradient and bathymetric tints. Shows oil and gas fields, oil and bio refineries, tanker terminals, oil and gas storages, oil and gas pipelines, export plants and import terminals. Includes: text, 5 inset maps, and 6 graphs. 5 inset maps: Egypt: offshore concession areas in Nile Delta Basin -- Cyprus: offshore concession areas -- Greece: concession areas -- Lebanon: offshore concession areas -- Israel: offshore concession areas. 6 graphs: Oil and gas - proved reserves, production and consumptions. Accompanies: Petroleum Economist, v. 86, no. 2, March 2019.
